domain.name: <%= @name %>
domain.devices:
<% @disks.each do |disk| %>
<source dev='/dev/md<%= disk.second %>'/> <target dev='<%= disk.first %>' bus='xen'/>
<% end %> <% @ethernets.each do |eth| %>
<source bridge='<%= @default_bridge %>' /> <% if !eth.blank? %> <mac address='<%= eth %>'/> <% end %>
<% end %> <% if @vnc_port %> <graphics type='vnc' port='<%= @vnc_port %>' autoport='no'/> <% end %>
